code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./addKeeper.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddKeeper=_ref=>{let{setKeeperList}=_ref;const[keeperObj,setKeeperObj]=useState({title:"",description:""});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setKeeperObj({...keeperObj,[name]:value});};const add=()=>{if(keeperObj.title){setKeeperList(prevList=>[...prevList,{...keeperObj,_id:Date.now()}]);setKeeperObj({title:"",description:""});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"addKeeper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"What is your next Task?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"inputBox titleInput",type:"text",name:"title",autoComplete:"off",placeholder:"Add Title",onChange:handleChange,value:keeperObj.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"inputBox description",name:"description",placeholder:"Add Description Here",onChange:handleChange,value:keeperObj.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"addButton",onClick:add,children:"Add"})]});};export default AddKeeper;
